title: Strengthening Instructional Design Practical Competencies: Designing Mobile Mathematics Learning Environments Based on Achievement Emotions

context.additional_context: Competency enhancement program for professionals in education/teaching/learning fields

learning_goals: Learners can report at least three experiences of reduced math anxiety using CVT-based emotion regulation strategies
Learners can complete microlearning content with over 80% participation rates on mobile platforms

Learners will complete a project-based assessment task (3 math lesson designs) within a week, incorporating at least three achievement emotion elements (challenging goals, feedback system, success experiences) per design, and achieve an average score of 4 or higher on a 5-point peer evaluation rubric (clarity, creativity, feasibility).
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
